page.title: 07TRANSPORT
page.content: The majority of this area is not served by Public Transport. The A342 which runs North South to the east of the area is on a bus route between Devizes and Chippenham. The remaining roads in the area are narrow country lanes and a heavy reliance is placed upon{private {cars,bicycles and foot as the modes of {transport. The road which runs East-West from Sandy Lane to Lacock through the block is very busy for its size, since it provides a useful cut off between the A342 and the A350 and beyond.During the peak of the tourist season this leads to{congestion on the {Pack Horse Bridge}across the River Avon. Transport is provided by the local authority for Chippenham schools
